content: this legal text provides a summary of the progress of a legal case that took place in ghent on january 19th 2017 the case involved two parties the plaintiff and the defendant the plaintiff filed a complaint outlining their issues and grievances against the defendant the defendant was served with a copy of the complaint and had a certain period of time to respond both parties engaged in the discovery phase gathering evidence and exchanging information they attempted to resolve the dispute through negotiation or mediation but if unsuccessful the case proceeded to trial after the trial a verdict was delivered by the judge or jury if either party was dissatisfied with the verdict they had the option to appeal the text does not provide information on the final outcome of the case it discusses various aspects of matrimonial property law including the liquidationdivision process in community regimes the text also mentions the parties involved in the case but their names are anonymized it concludes with a summary of objections raised by the parties and the courts assessment of their admissibility the case involves marriage systems inheritance law and gifts with a total amount of money involved being 20'2520.27â‚¬ the purpose of the case is to compensate for the impairment of mr ds ability to earn a professional income the court appeal is about the amount invested in the purchase of a family home in 1982 and the revaluation of the property the court agrees with the notaryliquidators calculations and confirms the decisions made the court also determines the litigation costs and concludes the case
